scripts.build: npm run train && cp src/app.js build/index.js && node extract_utterances.js && rm src/python/static/jupyterchat/*.js && cp build/*.js src/python/static/jupyterchat/
scripts.testNode: npm uninstall atlasapprox-nlp && rm -f atlasapprox-nlp-*.tgz && npm run build && npm pack && npm install fabilab-atlasapprox-nlp-*.tgz && node test/testModule.js
scripts.testWebpack: npm run build && cp build/index.js test/atlasapprox-nlp.js && cp build/modelString.js test/ && npx webpack serve ./test/webpack.js --static ./test --open /webpack.html --mode development
scripts.test: npm run testNode && npm run testWebpack
scripts.deploy: npm run build && sed -i 's/debug = true/debug = false/' build/index.js && npm publish --access public
